Functions.html#/c:@F@NSStringFromMMMLoad.name: NSStringFromMMMLoadableState
Functions.html#/c:@F@NSStringFromMMMLoad.abstract: As always, it can be handy to print the current state.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:MMMLoadable.h.name: MMMLoadableObserverDidChangeBlock
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:MMMLoadable.h.abstract: A block which is called when a lodable object is changed, see MMMLoadableObserver#loadableDidChange.

Protocols/MMMLoadableImage.html#/c:objc(.name: image
Protocols/MMMLoadableImage.html#/c:objc(.abstract: The image itself. As always, this is available only when contentsAvailable is YES.

Protocols/MMMLoadableObserver.html#/c:ob.name: -loadableDidChange:
Protocols/MMMLoadableObserver.html#/c:ob.abstract: Called whenever the loadable object changes (or sometimes when it might change).

Protocols/MMMLoadable.html#/c:objc(pl)MM.name: -sync
Protocols/MMMLoadable.html#/c:objc(pl)MM.abstract: Asks the loadable to sync now (e.g. download the associated contents).

Protocols/MMMLoadable.html#/c:objc(pl)MM.name: needsSync
Protocols/MMMLoadable.html#/c:objc(pl)MM.abstract: YES, if the loadable needs to be synced because it was never synced, or a cache timeout has expired,

Protocols/MMMLoadable.html#/c:objc(pl)MM.name: -syncIfNeeded
Protocols/MMMLoadable.html#/c:objc(pl)MM.abstract: Calls sync if needsSync is YES or if the state is different from ‘did sync successfully’.

Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(p.name: loadableState
Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: The state of the loadable, such as ‘idle’ or ‘syncing’.

Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(p.name: error
Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Optional error object describing the failure to sync the loadable.

Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(p.name: contentsAvailable
Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: YES, if the contents associated with this loadable (a bunch of properties collectively constituting the “value”

Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(p.name: -addObserver:
Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Adds a state change observer for this loadable.

Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html.name: MMMPureLoadable
Protocols/MMMPureLoadable.html.abstract: A protocol for a “read only” view on a loadable object which allows to observe the state

Protocols/MMMLoadable.html.name: MMMLoadable
Protocols/MMMLoadable.html.abstract: A part of the ‘loadable’ interface allowing to trigger a refresh (sync).

Protocols/MMMLoadableObserver.html.name: MMMLoadableObserver
Protocols/MMMLoadableObserver.html.abstract: Protocol observers of loadable objects should conform to.

Protocols/MMMLoadableImage.html.name: MMMLoadableImage
Protocols/MMMLoadableImage.html.abstract: We need thumbnail images in a couple of places and they are not typically accessible immediately even if they sit in

Enums/MMMLoadableGroupMode.html#/c:@E@MM.name: MMMLoadableGroupModeAll
Enums/MMMLoadableGroupMode.html#/c:@E@MM.abstract: The loadable state of the group in this mode is:

Enums/MMMLoadableGroupMode.html#/c:@E@MM.name: MMMLoadableGroupModeAny
Enums/MMMLoadableGroupMode.html#/c:@E@MM.abstract: The loadable state of the group in this mode is:

Enums/MMMLoadableGroupFailurePolicy.html.name: MMMLoadableGroupFailurePolicyStrict
Enums/MMMLoadableGroupFailurePolicy.html.abstract: The loadable state of the group in this mode is:

Enums/MMMLoadableState.html#/c:@E@MMMLoa.name: MMMLoadableStateIdle
Enums/MMMLoadableState.html#/c:@E@MMMLoa.abstract: Nothing is happening with the object now.

Enums/MMMLoadableState.html#/c:@E@MMMLoa.name: MMMLoadableStateSyncing
Enums/MMMLoadableState.html#/c:@E@MMMLoa.abstract: The object is being synced now (e.g. the contents is being downloaded or saved somewhere).

Enums/MMMLoadableState.html#/c:@E@MMMLoa.name: MMMLoadableStateDidSyncSuccessfully
Enums/MMMLoadableState.html#/c:@E@MMMLoa.abstract: The object has been successfully synced and its contents (promises â€” value) is available now.

Enums/MMMLoadableState.html#/c:@E@MMMLoa.name: MMMLoadableStateDidFailToSync
Enums/MMMLoadableState.html#/c:@E@MMMLoa.abstract: The object has not been able to sync for some reason.

Enums/MMMLoadableState.html.name: MMMLoadableState
Enums/MMMLoadableState.html.abstract: Main states a loadable object can be in.

Enums/MMMLoadableGroupFailurePolicy.html.name: MMMLoadableGroupFailurePolicy
Enums/MMMLoadableGroupFailurePolicy.html.abstract: Defines how sync failures in child loadables of a loadable group affect the sync state of the whole group.

Enums/MMMLoadableGroupMode.html.name: MMMLoadableGroupMode
Enums/MMMLoadableGroupMode.html.abstract: Defines how the composite state of the loadable group depends on the states of its children.

Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -setDidFailToSyncWithError:
Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Sets the error and changes the loadableState to “failed” which triggers “did change” notification.

Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -notifyDidChange
Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Allows to force sending “did change” event from the outside or a subclass.

Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).name: hasObservers
Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: YES, if the object has at least one observer installed.

Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -doSync
Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Subclasses can override to perform sync. Does nothing by default.

Classes/MMMPureLoadableGroup.html#/c:obj.name: -initWithLoadables:
Classes/MMMPureLoadableGroup.html#/c:obj.abstract: Convenience initializer using the “all” mode (former “strict” failure policy) for compatibility.

Classes/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -setSyncing
Classes/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Transitions the object into the ‘syncing’ without touching the current value of contentsAvailable.

Classes/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -setFailedToSyncWithError:
Classes/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Transitions the object into the ‘failed’ state setting the error field to the given value

Classes/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -setDidSyncSuccessfully
Classes/MMMPureLoadable.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Transitions the object into the ‘synced successfully’ state clearing the error field

Classes/MMMLoadableObserver.html#/c:objc.name: -initWithLoadable:block:
Classes/MMMLoadableObserver.html#/c:objc.abstract: Adds itself as an observer of the given loadable forwarding “did change” notifications to the given block.

Classes/MMMLoadableObserver.html#/c:objc.name: -initWithLoadable:target:selector:
Classes/MMMLoadableObserver.html#/c:objc.abstract: Adds itself as an observer of the given loadable forwarding “did change” notifications to the given target/selector.

Classes/MMMLoadableObserver.html#/c:objc.name: -remove
Classes/MMMLoadableObserver.html#/c:objc.abstract: Removes this observer from the associated loadable. It is safe to call it more than once.

Classes/MMMLoadableObserver.html.name: MMMLoadableObserver
Classes/MMMLoadableObserver.html.abstract: An proxy that sets itself as an observer of a loadable object and then forwards “did change” notifications

Classes/MMMLoadable.html.name: MMMLoadable
Classes/MMMLoadable.html.abstract: An implementation of a loadable that might be used as a base.

Classes/MMMPureLoadable.html.name: MMMPureLoadable
Classes/MMMPureLoadable.html.abstract: A basic implementation of MMMPureLoadable that does not require to override anything.

Classes/MMMPureLoadableGroup.html.name: MMMPureLoadableGroup
Classes/MMMPureLoadableGroup.html.abstract: Allows to treat several “pure” loadables as one.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MMMLoadableGroup.name: MMMLoadableGroup
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)MMMLoadableGroup.abstract: Similar to MMMPureLoadableGroup allows to treat a bunch of loadables as one.

Classes/MMMPureLoadableProxy.html.name: MMMPureLoadableProxy
Classes/MMMPureLoadableProxy.html.abstract: Sometimes an API expects a promise but you don’t have a reference to it until some time later,

Classes/MMMLoadableProxy.html.name: MMMLoadableProxy
Classes/MMMLoadableProxy.html.abstract: Same as MMMPureLoadableProxy but for MMMLoadable protocol.

Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html.name: MMMTestLoadable
Classes/MMMTestLoadable.html.abstract: Can be used as a base for unit test (view) models conforming to MMMLoadable.

Classes/MMMNamedLoadableImage.html.name: MMMNamedLoadableImage
Classes/MMMNamedLoadableImage.html.abstract: An image from the app’s bundle (accessible via +imageNamed: method of UIImage) wrapped into MMMLoadableImage

Classes/MMMImmediateLoadableImage.html.name: MMMImmediateLoadableImage
Classes/MMMImmediateLoadableImage.html.abstract: MMMLoadableImage-compatible wrapper for images that are immediately available.

Classes/MMMPublicLoadableImage.html.name: MMMPublicLoadableImage
Classes/MMMPublicLoadableImage.html.abstract: Implementation of MMMLoadableImage for images that are publicly accessible via a URL.

Classes/MMMTestLoadableImage.html.name: MMMTestLoadableImage
Classes/MMMTestLoadableImage.html.abstract: This is used in unit tests when we want to manipulate the state of a MMMLoadableImage to verify it produces the needed

Classes/MMMLoadableImageProxy.html.name: MMMLoadableImageProxy
Classes/MMMLoadableImageProxy.html.abstract: Sometimes an object implementing MMMLoadableImage is created much later than when it would be convenient to have one.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
